page.title: 05ST ERME HOUSE.
page.content: In St Erme there is a special home for autistics.Autistic people are unable to communicate as other people can but doctors are still not sure why this is.St Erme House community was set up three years ago.It can house up to fourteen people aged between sixteen and thirty two.It is run and paid for by voluntary contributions. A small group of the children from St Erme School went to visit the community with Mrs Keam,one of our teachers.We were shown around and told all about it.Marks and Spencers,the chain stores gave a lot of money towards setting up the home and the day room is known as St Michaels,which is Marks and Spencers brand name.The day room is used for many practical activities.
